snippet.title: Gothos (1997) PC FMV game intro
snippet.description: Gothos is an interactive mystery adventure on 3 CDs. Vampire clans from around the world are gathering, and rumors are circulating that the ancient Scrolls of the First Blood have been unearthed. You play as a male or female vampire and are sent by your Coven into Gothos to investigate. Once inside Gothos you will meet the city's many inhabitants. Some will be exactly as they appear to be, but others will be involved in the web of deceit and corruption that must be unraveled to complete your mission.
